title: Spectacular Clifftop Escape on the Italian Riviera next to Cinque Terre
description: Perched on a cliff top along the dramatic coastline of Italy’s Liguria, offering uninterrupted views over the sea and oozing character, Villa Domus 1938 sets a magical stage for a one-of-a-kind Italian escape. Ideally located between Portofino and the famed cliffs of Cinque Terre, this beautiful villa will be the perfect launchpad for your Italian explorations. Wake up each morning to a decadent continental breakfast, served with a side of magnificent views over the Ligurian Sea.
offer_address: Via Penisola Levante 39, 16039 Sestri Levante GE, Italy
